content: mallard duck this is an amigurumi pattern crochet stuffies this pattern is written in us terms in english no charts with lots of pictures of each part materials crochet hook 4 25mm g crochet hook 2 75mm c2 8mm plastic eyes for amigurumi fiberfill stuffing stitch marker yarn needle brown yarn……… medium #4 worsted size yarn 25-30 yards 14g dark green yarn……… medium #4 worsted size yarn 12-15 yards 7g white yarn……… medium #4 worsted size yarn 3-4 yards 1g yellow yarn……… light #3 dk size yarn 10-12 yards 5g the finished size of the duck is about 3 inches 10 cm of you use worsted weight yarn like me this little guy works up really quickly and can be made with almost any size yarn small amount of sewing
